类的使用
atu.input.Person

使用Person的程序包
程序包 说明
ATU_Program  
atu.input  
atu.process  

  • ATU_Program中Person的使用

    类型变量类型为Person的ATU_Program中的方法参数
    修饰符和类型 方法 说明
    static void Output.createList​(Team[] teamList, java.util.List<Person> STUdents, java.util.List<Person> decending)
    The method is used to create the digits which are important to create the table and chart.

  • atu.input中Person的使用

    返回变量类型为Person的类型的atu.input中的方法
    修饰符和类型 方法 说明
    java.util.List<Person> PeopleList.getStudents()
    This method is used to get the person at the index.
    参数类型为Person的atu.input中的方法
    修饰符和类型 方法 说明
    void PeopleList.addStudent​(Person p)
    This method is used to add a person to the list.

  • atu.process中Person的使用

    返回Person的atu.process中的方法
    修饰符和类型 方法 说明
    Person Team.get_A()
    The method that returns the first member/student in the Team.
    Person Team.get_B()
    The method that returns the second member/student in the Team.
    Person Team.get_C()
    The method that returns the third member/student in the Team.
    Person Team.get_D()
    The method that returns the fourth member/student in the Team.
    返回变量类型为Person的类型的atu.process中的方法
    修饰符和类型 方法 说明
    java.util.List<Person> Engine.get_K1list()
    The method that returns the K1_list of the students of the Engine instance.
    java.util.List<Person> Engine.get_K2list()
    The method that returns the K2_list attribute of the Engine instance.
    java.util.List<Person> Engine.get_K3list()
    The method that returns the K3_list attribute of the Engine instance.
    java.util.List<Person> Engine.get_list()
    The method that returns the list attribute of the Engine instance.
    java.util.List<Person> Engine.get_list_descending()
    The method that returns the list of the students of the Engine instance in descending order of K1_energy.
    参数类型为Person的atu.process中的方法
    修饰符和类型 方法 说明
    void Team.set_A​(Person man)
    The method that sets the first member to the Team instance.
    void Team.set_B​(Person man)
    The method that sets the second member to the Team instance.
    void Team.set_C​(Person man)
    The method that sets the third member to the Team instance.
    void Team.set_D​(Person man)
    The method that sets the fourth member to the Team instance.
    类型变量类型为Person的atu.process中的方法参数
    修饰符和类型 方法 说明
    void Engine.arrange_K1​(java.util.List<Person> list)
    The method that copies value of the parameter and uses it to sort a list into the Person instances with descending order of K1_energy and if they have same K1_energy, then Person instance with lower K2_energy will be in previous order.
    void Engine.arrange_K2​(java.util.List<Person> list)
    The method that copies value of the parameter and uses it to sort a list into the Person instances with ascending order of K2_energy and if they have same K2_energy, then Person instance with lower K1_energy will be in previous order.
    void Engine.arrange_K3​(java.util.List<Person> list)
    The method that copies value of the parameter and uses it to sort a list into the Person instances with descending order of K2_energy and if they have same K2_energy, then Person instance with lower K1_energy will be in previous order.
    void Engine.arrange_list​(java.util.List<Person> list)
    The method that copies value of the parameter and uses it to sort a list into the Person instances with descending order of K1_energy and if they have same K1_energy, then Person instance with lower K2_energy will be in previous order.
    void Engine.setList​(java.util.List<Person> csv)
    The method that copies value of the parameter and assigns it to the student list attribute of the Engine class.
    参数类型为Person的atu.process中的构造器
    构造器 说明
    Team​(int id, int no, Person i, Person j, Person k, Person l, java.lang.String boss)
    The constructor for Engine class.
    类型变量类型为Person的atu.process中的构造器参数
    构造器 说明
    Engine​(int size, java.util.List<Person> input)
    The constructor for Engine class.
